TestCaseMetaData.id: Final result to wrong patient - NG
TestCaseMetaData.name: Final result to wrong patient header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to process the progression from a "final" to "wrong patient" report.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to create final result message and subsequently report that that result was reported on the wrong patient.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to produce a "final" report and be able to indicate, that a report was sent in error on the wrong patient.
